title.bibl: Scandia, Mar. 9, 1912. [Knights of White Cross Dedicate New Quarters]

div.bibl: Scandia, Mar. 9, 1912. [KNIGHTS OF WHITE CROSS DEDICATE NEW QUARTERS]

body.p: Leif Erikson Lodge, No. 9, R. H. K. (Knights of the White Cross), dedicated its new quarters in Eagle Hall Tuesday evening. A number of visitors from other lodges, and the officers of the Supreme Lodge attended, making the affair a numerical and social success. On Sunday, March 17, Leif Erikson lodge will celebrate its twenty-seventh anniversary with a banquet and dance at Spaulding Hall.
